alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 3:04AM PDT until March 29 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From noon to 10 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More localized winds for Tuesday night into Wednesday morning will become stronger and more widespread for Wednesday afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
